title: Modus Operandi: and other crime stories
description: Modus Operandi: Retired homicide detective, Dutch Banner is stranded in motel with a group of misfits in a middle of a blizzard. When the young office clerk disappears, Dutch has to work one more case, and what about the bank robbers....   Hostage: is the story of twelve year old Becca and the hard life lesson she learns about love and loss when she is taken hostage by a desperate convict on the run.    Little Runaway: The brimming backpack, the holes in the jeans. I had seen it all before. She was a runaway. She eyed me there, in the pouring rain. Deciding if she could trust me. She made the wrong choice...
author: Loretta Green
